definition: to depend on/to be dependent on
to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
"urban dependence disease" (sufferers are unwilling to give up city comforts and return to the countryside)

sentences.english: Non-codependent love requires wholeness to emerge within.
sentences.chinese: 不再相互依賴的愛，需要從內在出現完整。

sentences.english: However, dependence need not be long term.
sentences.chinese: 然而，依賴並不需要很長時間。

sentences.english: Replaceability is limited to changing the dependency to depend on something different.
sentences.chinese: 可替換性僅限於修改依賴關係以依賴不同的內容。

sentences.english: Replaceability is limited to changing the dependency to depend on something different.
sentences.chinese: 可替換性僅限於修改依賴關係以依賴不同的內容。

sentences.english: Living things depend on the sunlight.
The non-energy resources are not abundant in Britain, It mainly dependent on imports of industrial raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 英國的非能源資源不豐富，主要工業原料依賴進口。

sentences.english: The cold-sensitive neuron was voltage dependent.
sentences.chinese: 該類神經元具有電壓依賴性。

sentences.english: But others seem content to rely on automatic stabilisers.
sentences.chinese: 而其餘國家則情願依賴自動穩定器的作用。

sentences.english: Documenting and defending these decisions depends on the communication skills discussed below.
sentences.chinese: 證明和維護這些決策依賴於下面討論的交流技能。

sentences.english: It is up to the modeling team to establish conventions of model organization and interdependency.
sentences.chinese: 這取決於建模團隊建立模型管理和相互依賴的約定。

sentences.english: Most of the time the data is dependent upon the middleware being used.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數情況下，數據依賴於所使用的中間件。

sentences.english: This is biological and biochemical codependence from our point of view.
sentences.chinese: 以我們的觀點，這是生物學與生物化學的相互依賴。

sentences.english: If you rely on a church membe morership.
sentences.chinese: 借使你依賴教會會友的身份。

sentences.english: It's quite similar to alcohol-dependent hepatotoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 這是非常相似，酒精依賴的肝毒性。

sentences.english: Your pet is depending on you to know when it is ill.
sentences.chinese: 你的豬豬依賴於你去發現什麼時候它病了。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
